Observed at: Cypress Hills Provincial Park 9:00 AM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %

Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: SW 18 km/h

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 3 except 9 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High plus 3 except 9 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of snow late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
